description:
Okteto is a cloud-native development platform that bridges the gap between local development and production, enabling seamless development and deployment in Kubernetes clusters.


What's Changed
New Feature
- set okteto context and namespace from env vars by @andreafalzetti in #4247
- Use .oktetoignore in deploy and destroy remote by @maroshii in #4316
Bug Fix
- fix: not show unwanted warning by @jLopezbarb in #4282
- fix: retry builds on depot by @jLopezbarb in #4285
- Include all manifest properties to "friendly err" util + Add okteto test alias by @andreafalzetti in #4298
- Fix regression with OKTETO_TOKEN and improve DevX for invalid token by @andreafalzetti in #4297
- Preserve local env vars if also declared in .env` + Add E2E test for Okteto Variables by @andreafalzetti in #4303
- fix: warning displayed even when the file was invalid by @jLopezbarb in #4304
- Validate Test section to avoid panic if test section is not populated properly by @andreafalzetti in #4309
- DEV-335 Repository is not being calculated correctly for Smart Builds when the manifest is within a subdirectory of a repository by @ifbyol in #4307
- fix panic when inferring stack with empty image by @andreafalzetti in #4312
- fix: panics on command initialsation by @jLopezbarb in #4322
- okteto exec to work the same as kubectl exec by @jLopezbarb in #4289
- fix test logs by @jLopezbarb in #4325
- [Backport release-2.28] fix: use the correct image on okteteo test by @github-actions in #4330
Full Changelog: https://github.com/okteto/okteto/compare/2.27.4...2.28.0
